statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_rewards;
SELECT customer_id, reward_points FROM loyalty_program_rewards WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_rewards ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(reward_points) AS total_reward_points FROM loyalty_program_rewards GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM loyalty_program_rewards WHERE reward_points > 1000;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_rewards WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_program_rewards GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_points > 500;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM loyalty_program_rewards WHERE reward_points > 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC, transaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM loyalty_program_rewards WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM loyalty_program_rewards GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_transaction_amount < 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT customer_name, total_points FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_points FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC, total_points ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_points FROM customer WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(total_points) AS total_points_sum FROM customer GROUP BY customer_id, customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_points FROM customer WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer INNER JOIN transaction ON customer.customer_id = transaction.customer_id WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT customer_name, total_points, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM customer LEFT JOIN transaction ON customer.customer_id = transaction.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING num_transactions > 3 ORDER BY total_points DESC;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM customer LEFT JOIN transaction ON customer.customer_id = transaction.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_points) AS avg_points FROM customer GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_points < 50 ORDER BY avg_points ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM customers GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE c.customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, reward_type, reward_points FROM customers c JOIN rewards r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE r.reward_points >= 50 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, reward_id, expiration_date FROM rewards_history ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT id, name, points FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.id = rewards.customer_id;
SELECT rewards.id, customers.name, rewards.points, rewards.expiration_date FROM rewards JOIN customers ON rewards.customer_id = customers.id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT reward_type, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE customer_id = 'a881f674-ec2c-4b76-9509-3a68a1282532';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points < 50 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, t.transaction_date, t.total_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, r.reward_type, r.reward_points FROM customers c INNER JOIN rewards r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE r.expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
